_header: No man this book he take away
_description: Epilogue to Audelay’s book of poems — sixteen lines including three Latin lines

BodDou302.First Lines:
No mon þis book he take a wayNy kutt owte noo leef y say for
                    why…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…That made þis bok by goddus graceDeeff siek blynd as he
                    lay
BodDou302.Attributed Title:
Cuius finis bonus ipsum totum bonum finito libro sit laus et gloria
                        christo (f. 35rb)
